<!-- retrieve latest ACE data -->
```{r,  echo = FALSE, eval = TRUE, message=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
ACE_landing_page <- read.csv(
  file  = here::here ("content","economics","ACE_landing_page_data.csv")) 

if(ncol(ACE_landing_page)==1){
  ACE_landing_page <- read.csv2(
    file  = here::here ("content","economics","ACE_landing_page_data.csv")) 
}

ACE_landing_page <- ACE_landing_page%>%
  as_tibble%>%
  mutate_all(as.numeric)%>%
  rename(year_data=1)

year_report <- max(ACE_landing_page$year_data)

costs_per_cph <- ACE_landing_page %>% filter(year_data == year_report) %>%
  select(costs_per_cph) %>% unlist %>% unname %>% round
costs_per_cph_change_perc <- ACE_landing_page %>% filter(year_data == year_report) %>%
  select(costs_per_cph_change_perc) %>% unlist %>% unname 
costs_per_cph_change_perc <- paste0(if_else(costs_per_cph_change_perc >0, "+", ""), round(costs_per_cph_change_perc*100,if_else(costs_per_cph_change_perc >=1, 0, 1)),"%")

ATCO_prod <- ACE_landing_page %>% filter(year_data == year_report) %>%
  select(ATCO_prod) %>% unlist %>% unname %>% round(.,2)
ATCO_prod_change_perc <- ACE_landing_page %>% filter(year_data == year_report) %>%
  select(ATCO_prod_change_perc) %>% unlist %>% unname
ATCO_prod_change_perc <- paste0(if_else(ATCO_prod_change_perc >0, "+", ""), round(ATCO_prod_change_perc*100,if_else(ATCO_prod_change_perc >=1, 0, 1)),"%")

ATCO_costs_per_h <- ACE_landing_page %>% filter(year_data == year_report) %>%
  select(ATCO_costs_per_h) %>% unlist %>% unname %>% round
ATCO_costs_per_h_change_perc <- ACE_landing_page %>% filter(year_data == year_report) %>%
  select(ATCO_costs_per_h_change_perc) %>% unlist %>% unname
ATCO_costs_per_h_change_perc <- paste0(if_else(ATCO_costs_per_h_change_perc >0, "+", ""), round(ATCO_costs_per_h_change_perc*100,if_else(ATCO_costs_per_h_change_perc >=1, 0, 1)),"%")

support_costs_per_cph <- ACE_landing_page %>% filter(year_data == year_report) %>%
  select(support_costs_per_cph) %>% unlist %>% unname %>% round
support_costs_per_cph_change_perc <- ACE_landing_page %>%
  filter(year_data == year_report) %>% select(support_costs_per_cph_change_perc) %>%
  unlist %>% unname 
support_costs_per_cph_change_perc <- paste0(if_else(support_costs_per_cph_change_perc >0, "+", ""), round(support_costs_per_cph_change_perc*100,if_else(support_costs_per_cph_change_perc >=1, 0, 1)),"%")

```

<div class="container">
<div class="row align-items-start">
<div class="col-sm-9">
The ACE benchmarking project analyses the cost-effectiveness and productivity of 38 European Air Navigation Service Providers (ANSPs) in Europe. It examines both individual ANSPs and the Pan-European ATM/CNS system as a whole.

Given the unprecedented drop in traffic, all the ACE indicators are massively impacted in 2020. This report therefore puts a special emphasis on the observed changes between 2019 and 2020 and the mitigation measures implemented by ANSPs. It also introduces new financial indicators in order to monitor the impact of the COVID-19 pandemic on ANSPs financial situation.

The ACE interactive dashboard allows you to access the latest available data and analysis provided in the ACE Benchmarking Reports prepared by the EUROCONTROL Performance Review Unit.
</div>

#### ACE 2019 Highlights

<div class="container">
<div class="row align-items-start">
<div class="col-sm-6">
* ANSPs **gate-to-gate revenues fell by -53%** as a result of an unprecedented traffic decrease in 2020 (-57%). 

* Cost containment measures were implemented and **ATM/CNS provision costs fell by -€441M**, mainly through reduced staff costs (-€314M) and lower cost of capital (-€92M). 
</div>
<div class="col-sm-6">
* Many ANSPs contracted new loans in order to respond to liquidity issues: short and long-term **borrowings rose by +€2.5 billion (+134%)**.

* Liquidity issues also resulted in the **postponement of some capital expenditures**, which were -26% lower than in 2019.
</div>
</div></div>
